articles.title: Chinese New Year tourism hopes fizzle for Asian destinations, as China's travellers stay home - CNA
articles.description: BANGKOK: A hoped-for boom in Chinese tourism in Asia over next week’s Chinese New Year holidays looks set to be more of a blip as most travellers opt to stay inside China if they go anywhere. From the beaches

articles.title: POC, PSC get pedals circling for Cambodia Games - Manila Bulletin
articles.description: A first-time meet between Philippine Olympic Committee (POC) and newly-appointed Philippine Sports Commission (PSC) brass happened Wednesday night, Jan. 18, to get the pedals circling for the country’s preparations for the 32nd Southeast Asian Games.
